body:
$AAPL 

Historical p/e has be near or sub 20. It is likely headed there. At $5.62 ttm eps, share price would be $112. To support $180 share price, eps needs to be $9, almost double. Lowest it got during last rate hike was 13 😳

Apple share buybacks help, but not enough.

Cheapest large tech play would be $FB . P/e is 22, and the lowest it got during last rate hike was 17.

$AAPL $BA $SOFI 
Hoping for a bounce early this week
@onek Dan is one of the best chartist/ strategist with a proven record. Noone can predict anything 100%. I think big techs will have great er. The bottom was in on Friday. $AAPL $FB $AMZN $GOOGL
This week, Technology hit new 19-year highs relative to the Nasdaq. $AAPL $MSFT $XLK $COMP
$MSFT $AAPL $TSLA $INTC $BA
